review: Connectivity is spotty at best even though our wireless router is right next to the TV where the Fire TV stick is being used. This seems a bit more complicated to use than the Roku I have. The remote barely works - there's a huge delay between when a button is pressed and when the action is executed. I guess that's also related to the connectivity issue. I guess it's just not as intuitive as I'd like it to be. It was a good purchase for what I paid, but price doesn't mean much if the item itself doesn't function wellI've only used it for about 2 weeks now, so I'll revise my review if things get better.
